name: Warrior of Nowhere Demo
description:
Warrior of Nowhere follows the adventure of a walking sack of blood who travels from an island of flesh to nowhere, with the mission to exterminate the lust from the world, which is turning every living being into lustful creatures that rapes and devours everyone they find. Explore a bizarre reality of a unknown world, where things feel familiars but just as alienated from natural events, creatures surreal and impossible to live yet existing inside it, that stands out like a drop of ink on a blank papyrus. Uncover the dark secrets of the new land, learn about its people, their believes, stories and history and get emerged into this world.

- Classic RPG combat with a twist and variations for each character of your party.

- Multiple secrets to uncover.

- Medieval ambientation with dark lore.

-Unique characters.

-Around one hour of gameplay for this demo.
